code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./search.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Search(){const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const[searchResults,setSearchResults]=useState([]);const handleSearch=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/employees/search?name=${searchTerm}`);setSearchResults(res.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error searching employees:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Search Employee"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter employee name",className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,className:"search-btn",children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"search-results",children:searchResults.map(employee=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:employee.name},employee._id))})]});}
